summary: This module defines classes for creating and managing polygon layers on a map. It allows developers to add collections of polygon markers with configurable geometry, fill and stroke styling, optional labels, and orientation, while handling rendering performance and integration with the map control system.
business_intent: Enable applications built with the Flet Python SDK to display custom polygon shapes on interactive maps, supporting rich visual customization and efficient rendering for use cases such as geographic boundaries, zones, or highlighted areas.
